text:
Message 361 of 4024
We have a lot of stuff that I was hoping to discuss.
- Kids therapist parent meeting
- Next steps for Alki (past 20 days)
- Elsa’s wedding budget and plans
- What we are telling the kids now
- Firm up plans for holiday weekend
That’s just a list of examples. There are more for sure.
I’m eager to keep working with you to make progress.
Thanks!
Sent:01/12/2024 at 12:27 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:25 PM)
Subject:Are we just dead in the Water?
Message 362 of 4024
AD has both AAU and Rec at 6:00 tonight.
Should we coordinate on a kid related issue so we can jointly resolve a relevant parenting situation?
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:25 PM)
Subject:Hoops Tonight
Message 363 of 4024
I planned to take Adrian to AAU tonight. He has a game Sunday night.
There is no rec league game this weekend.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:26 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:28 PM)
Subject:Re: Hoops Tonight
Message 364 of 4024
Kids therapist I can respond to her.
Alki I understood you were sending the NTV
Elsa wedding, you said you did not want to be in the discussion. She still needs to align what she wants to do.
Kids... going to await your response after you discuss with lawyer and see your response. I did not create this situation but had to respond with only
option I had to protect me and kids.
Holiday weekend. This will change after you discuss with lawyer. Plan is to stay with me.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:30 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:32 PM)
Subject:Re: Are we just dead in the Water?
